en.title: FE Professional Selling Skills Course By Dr. BN Edwards!

table.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; text-align: justify; background-color: rgb(238, 240, 252);

td.strong: REPORT BY PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR NAZEERUDIN BIN ZAINAL ABIDIN.

tr.td:
It was another very successful training course by Dr. BN Edward – Asia's No.1 MLM Network Marketing Expert! The course was held on 15th and 16th October 2011 at Nouvelle Hotel, Seri Kembangan, unforgettable days filled with insight and inspiration for BBC Team.
It was a sell-out course with 188 participants packing the hall to the brim to gain knowledge on the importance of Sales and Leadership. The 2 Day course builds up the participants with powerful experimental exercises, application of selling tools and skills that produces immediate and life changing results.
There was never a dull moment as Dr. BN Edward personally coached and drilled participants on critical sales skills, including the most important skill of all the skill to overcome our own “Fear Voice” , the voice that stops us from pursuing our goals and dreams with self doubting and self critical thoughts. By the end of the 2 Day course, all participants have renewed self confidence and attitude that gives them the courage and perseverance needed to pursue and achieve their goals and dreams.
All the participants also had the opportunity to share experiences and make new friends during the 2 Day course. The course has been very impactful and has helped to gain momentum for all the participants to help them generate more sales and more income. Happy Selling!!!!
The organizers would like to thank FusionExcel International Founder CEO Mr. Paul Ting and Founder Director Mr. KS Lee, for the support and encouragement to organize the course and to all the participants and the office support staff, we thank you as well!
